projects.name: Thermal Ticket Printer Utility for NetCore
projects.description:
This library is designed to generate and print invoices in a format suitable for thermal printers, specifically those that handle 55mm and 80mm paper widths.
It provides a flexible and customizable way to create invoices with a professional layout, including support for logos, business information, customer details, product lists, and totals. The library is written in C# and is compatible with Windows Forms applications. It can also be adapted for use in console applications or other .NET environments.
highlights: Developed in C# with .NET Core
Supports thermal printers with 55mm and 80mm paper widths.
Customizable invoice layout with logos, business information, customer details, product lists, and totals.
Compatible with Windows Forms applications.
Can be adapted for use in console applications or other .NET environments.
Open-source project available on GitHub.
Published on NuGet for easy integration into other projects.

projects.name: Youtube Video / Playlist Downloader CLI
projects.description:
Youtube Single Video and Playlist Downloader. 
      This is a simple command-line tool that allows you to download videos and playlists from YouTube. It is written in Node JS and uses the yt-dlp library to interact with the YouTube API. The tool is easy to use and can be run from the command line with a few simple commands. It supports downloading both single videos and entire playlists, and allows you to choose the video quality and format that you want to download.
highlights: Built in Node JS with the yt-dlp library.
Supports downloading single videos and entire playlists.
Allows you to choose the video quality and format that you want to download.
Easy to use command-line interface.
Sort videos and playlist on specific folders.

projects.name: Easy Objects
projects.description: A simple utility library for working with arrays and objects in JavaScript
highlights: Built in Javascript
Supports working with arrays and objects
Provides utility functions for common tasks
Easy to use and integrate into other projects
Open-source project available on GitHub

projects.name: Nicaraguan DNI Validator
projects.description: Este es un paquete que sirve para validar números de cédula de Nicaragua., verificando la validez en función de los códigos de municipio, la fecha de nacimiento y una letra final calculada utilizando el algoritmo de módulo 23.
highlights: Valida números de cédula (16 dígitos con guiones o 14 dígitos sin guiones).
Verificar los códigos de municipio con una lista predefinida.
Validar el formato de la fecha de nacimiento (ddmmyy).
Calcular la letra final basada en los números de la cédula para verificar que sea correcta.
It has 2 modes: silent and verbose.
Open-source project available on GitHub.
Additional 2 extra functionalities to show departments and municipalities filtered by department.

projects.name: Pharmacy Sales and Inventory Managment System
projects.description: A WinForms application to manage sales and inventory for a pharmacy.
highlights: Developed with C# WinForms for the desktop interface
Uses MySQL as the database for storing ad inventory data
Ensures security with role-based access control for different user levels
